Verses: 1 EN SAGODHARARE, MAGIMAIYULLA NAMMUDAIYA KARTHTHARAAGIYA YESUKIRISTHUVINMELULLA VISUVAASATHTHAI PATCHAPAADHATHTHODE PATRIKKOLLAADHIRUPPEERGALAAGA.
2 ENENIL, PONMODHIRAMUM MINUKKULLA VASTHIRAMUM THARITHTHIRUKKIRA ORUMANUSHANUM, KANDHAIYAANA VASTHIRAM THARITHTHIRUKKIRA ORU THARITHTHIRANUM UNGAL AALAYATHTHIL VARUMPODHU,

3 MINUKKULLA VASTHIRANDHARITHTHAVANAI KANNOKKI: NEER INDHA NALLA IDATHTHIL UTKAARUM ENDRUM; THARITHTHIRANAI PAARTHTHU: NEE ANGE NILLU, ALLADHU INGE EN PAADHAPADIYANDAIYILE UTKAARU ENDRUM NEENGAL SONNAAL,
4 UNGALUKKULLE PEDHAGAMPANNI, THAGAADHA SINDHANAIGALODE NIDHAANIKKIRAVARGALAAYIRUPPEERGALALLAVAA?

5 EN PIRIYAMAANA SAGODHARARE, KELUNGAL; DHEVAN IVVULAGATHTHIN THARITHTHIRARAI VISUVAASATHTHIL AISUVARIYAVAANGALAAGAVUM, THAMMIDATHTHIL ANBUKOORUGIRAVARGALUKKUTH THAAM VAAKKUTHTHATHTHAMPANNINA RAAJYATHTHAI SUDHANDHARIKKIRAVARGALAAGAVUM THERINDHUKOLLAVILLAIYAA?
6 NEENGALO THARITHTHIRARAI KANAVEENAMPANNUGIREERGAL. AISUVARIYAVAANGALALLAVO UNGALAI ODUKKUGIRAARGAL? AVARGALALLAVO UNGALAI NIYAAYAASANANGALUKKU MUNBAAGA IZHUKKIRAARGAL?
7 UNGALUKKU THARIKKAPPATTA NALLA NAAMATHTHAI AVARGALALLAVO THOOSHIKKIRAARGAL?
8 UNNIDATHTHIL NEE ANBUKOORUGIRADHUPOLA PIRANIDATHTHILUM ANBUKOORUVAAYAAGA ENDRU VEDHAVAAKKIYAM SOLLUGIRA RAAJAREEGA PIRAMAANATHTHAI NEENGAL NIRAIVETRINAAL NANMAISEYVEERGAL.
9 PATCHAPAADHAMULLAVARGALAAYIRUPPEERGALAANAAL, PAAVANJEYDHU, MEERINAVARGALENDRU NIYAAYAPPIRAMAANATHTHAAL THEERKKAPPADUVEERGAL.
10 EPPADIYENIL, ORUVAN NIYAAYAPPIRAMAANAM MUZHUVADHAIYUM KAIKKONDIRUNDHUM, ONDRILE THAVARINAAL ELLAAVATRILUM KUTRAVAALIYAAYIRUPPAAN.

11 ENENDRAAL, VIBASAARANJEYYAADHIRUPPAAYAAGA ENDRU SONNAVAR KOLAISEYYAADHIRUPPAAYAAGA ENDRUM SONNAAR; AADHALAAL, NEE VIBASAARANJEYYAAMALIRUNDHUM KOLAISEYDHAAYAANAAL NIYAAYAPPIRAMAANATHTHAI MEERINAVANAAVAAI.
12 SUYAADHEENAPPIRAMAANATHTHINAAL NIYAAYATHTHEERPPADAIYAPPOGIRAVARGALAAI ADHARKETRAPADI PESI, ADHARKETRAPADI SEYYUNGAL.
13 ENENDRAAL, IRAKKANJEYYAADHAVANUKKU IRAKKAMILLAADHA NIYAAYATHTHEERPPU KIDAIKKUM; NIYAAYATHTHEERPPUKKU MUNBAAGA IRAKKAM MENMAIPAARAATTUM.
14 EN SAGODHARARE, ORUVAN THANAKKU VISUVAASAMUNDENDRU SOLLIYUM, KIRIYAIKALILLAADHAVANAANAAL AVANUKKU PIRAYOJANAMENNA? ANDHA VISUVAASAM AVANAI RATCHIKKUMAA?
15 ORU SAGODHARANAAVADHU SAGODHARIYAAVADHU VASTHIRAMILLAAMALUM ANUDHINA AAGAARAMILLAAMALUM IRUKKUMPODHU,
16 UNGALIL ORUVAN AVARGALAI NOKKI: NEENGAL SAMAADHAANATHTHODE PONGAL, KULIRKAAINDHU PASIYAARUNGALENDRU SOLLIYUM, SAREERATHTHIRKU VENDIYAVAIGALAI AVARGALUKKU KODAAVITTAAL PIRAYOJANAMENNA?
17 APPADIYE VISUVAASAMUM KIRIYAIGALILLAADHIRUNDHAAL THANNILEDHAANE SETHTHADHAAYIRUKKUM.
18 ORUVAN: UNAKKU VISUVAASAMUNDU, ENAKKU KIRIYAIGALUNDU; KIRIYAIGALILLAAMAL UN VISUVAASATHTHAI ENAKKUKKAANBI, NAAN EN VISUVAASATHTHAI EN KIRIYAIGALINAALE UNAKKU KAANBIPPEN ENBAANE.
19 DHEVAN ORUVAR UNDENDRU VISUVAASIKKIRAAI, APPADI SEYGIRADHU NALLADHUDHAAN; PISAASUGALUM VISUVAASITHTHU, NADUNGUGINDRANA.
20 VEENAANA MANUSHANE, KIRIYAIGALILLAADHA VISUVAASAM SETHTHADHENDRU NEE ARIYAVENDUMO?
21 NAMMUDAIYA PIDHAAVAAGIYA AABIRAHAAM THAN KUMAARAN EESAAKKAI PALIPEEDATHTHINMEL SELUTHTHINAPODHU, KIRIYAIGALINAALE ALLAVO NEEDHIMAANAAKKAPPATTAAN?
22 VISUVAASAM AVANUDAIYA KIRIYAIGALODEKOODA MUYARSISEYDHU, KIRIYAIGALINAALE VISUVAASAM POORANAPPATTADHENDRU KAANGIRAAYE.
23 APPADIYE AABIRAGAAM DHEVANAI VISUVAASITHTHAAN, ADHU AVANUKKU NEEDHIYAAGA ENNAPPATTADHU ENGIRA VEDHAVAAKKIYAM NIRAIVERITRU; AVAN THEVANUTAIYA SINEGIDHANENNAPPATTAAN.
24 AADHALAAL, MANUSHAN VISUVAASATHTHILEMAATHTHIRAMALLA, KIRIYAIGALINAALEYUM NEEDHIMAANAAKKAPPATUKIRAANENDRU NEENGAL KAANGIREERGALE.
25 ANDHAPPADI RAAGAAP ENNUM VESIYUM THOODHARGALAI ETRUKKONTU VERUVAZHIYAAI ANUPPIVITTAPODHU, KIRIYAIGALINAALE ALLAVO NEEDHIYULLAVALAAKKAPPATTAAL?
26 APPADIYE, AAVIYILLAADHA SAREERAM SETHTHADHAAYIRUKKIRADHUPOLA, KIRIYAIGALILLAADHA VISUVAASAMUM SETHTHADHAAYIRUKKIRADHU.
